basic_information.scholarship_name: Price Lang Endowed Scholarship in Communications Excellence

description: The purpose of this fund is to provide scholarships for students majoring in either professional media or strategic communications. Eligibility Requirements Complete the application and provide a transcript Enrolled full-time Undergraduate junior or incoming senior Minimum 3.0 GPA Professional Media or Strategic Communications major Complete a 500-word essay on the importance of communications and media in shaping public policy

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
